raw_body: Managing Director of IIHRM. Beloved husband of Nadee (Managing Director - C.G.J. Private Ltd), father of Onaya (E.C.U. Campus), Kaveeka (Bishop’s College), Akein and Jithein (Gateway Intl. - Rajagiriya), son of late Gemunu Kulatunga and Belle, brother of Shanaka (Emirates DXB), son-in-law of late Upali and Seetha Abeykoon, brother-in-law of Dumini (DXB), Wasantha and Chamila Abeykoon (Australia). Remains lie at residence No. 300/101, Westwood Par
